label: 朝所
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A building in the Daijōkan compound that was used by the kugyō as a dining hall and, on occasion, as an office for the transaction of official business. [太政官、公卿] [Also read aitadokoro, ashitadokoro]
